<onlyinclude>** {{nbt|string|minecraft:base_color}}: The base dye color of the banner applied on a shield. If neither this nor <code>[[Data component format#banner_patterns|minecraft:banner_patterns]]</code> is specified, then the shield model will show its normal wooden texture. If the <code>[[Data component format#banner_patterns|minecraft:banner_patterns]]</code> component is specified but this component is not, then ''white'' is used as the base banner color. If present on a [[shield]] item, the item name is overridden as "<color> Shield" (e.g. if set to {{code|green}}, the name will be "Green Shield").<!--
